subject: Re: [junit] To moderators
msgSnippet: ... We go through periods where I am the only active moderator. When I am busy, we get a backlog of messages waiting for approval. If more moderators remained
messageBody:
Cedric ROUVRAIS wrote:

> Hi guys,
>
> I sent out a mail to the group on Sunday, however I don't see it on the
> mailing list. Do I receive a notification if the mail is rejected?
> Or putting it another way, how do I know that it has been received and
> pending moderator approval?
>
> I thank you in advance for any response,

We go through periods where I am the only active moderator. When I am
busy, we get a backlog of messages waiting for approval. If more
moderators remained consistently active, the backlog would not be as long.

I'm looking for volunteers to moderate. I'd like 3 more. Send e-mail to
junit-owner@yahoogroups.com. Don't be offended if I don't choose you.
It's possible 50 people will volunteer.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
